name: hpm-cli
description: A plugin manager for HyperTerm.

name: hypertheme
description: A theme manager for Hyperterm, published right off the bat. You should import your favorite text-editor or terminal theme and add it to awesome-hyperterm!

name: hyperpower
description: Add a pinch of kick-arse raw POWER to your Hyperterm! Adds the pixel-explosion and shake effect that's been implemented in several text editors.

name: hyperline
description: A status line at the bottom of your Hyperterm!

name: hyperterm-blink
description: Make your cursor blink.

name: hyperborder
description: Add a gradient border with the same colors as in the Hyperterm logo.

name: hyperterm-transparent-bg
description: add a transparent background to your Hyperterm through an interesting HTML hack.

name: hypercwd
description: Open new tabs with the same directory as your current tab.

name: hyperterm-1password
description: Integration with 1Password (password manager).

name: hyperterm-visor
description: Show/hide your HyperTerm terminal with a global hotkey & more.

name: hyperterm-open-devtools
description: Open DevTools for currently showing web page with a hotkey.

name: hyperterm-close-on-left
description: Positions the close tab button on the left.

name: hyperterm-sync-settings
description: Easy way to backup and restore HyperTerm settings to Github.

name: hyperterm-mactabs
description: Better tab styles, with macOS-inspired design and close buttons on the left, compatible with most themes.

name: hyperterm-final-say
description: Allows user-set overrides of any plugin or theme settings applied on top of the defaults ./.hyperterm.js.

name: hyperterm-overlay
description: A complete and customizable solution for overlay window in your HyperTerm.

name: hyperterm-install-devtools
description: Use Chrome DevTools extension on HyperTerm.

name: hyperterm-tab-icons
description: Add icons to the header tabs for the current running process in HyperTerm.

name: hyperterm-summon
description: Summon your Hyperterm windows with a system-wide hotkey.

name: config-hyperterm
description: Easily set/get hyperterm config.

name: is-hyperterm
description: Check if your Node.js script is running in HyperTerm.

name: hyperterm-paste
description: Pasting into terminal made safe and easy.

name: hyperterm-alternatescroll
description: Mousewheel/trackpad scrolling for alternate screen. (less, git log, nano, etc...)

name: hyperterm-lastpass
description: Lastpass plugin for autofilling passwords in HyperTerm.

name: hyperterm-dibdabs
description: Unique colored dot on the left of the tab is added for quick identification of commonly used tabs based on its title.

name: hyperterm-tabs
description: Rearrange tabs by drag&dropping them

name: hyperterm-focus-reporting
description: Adds focus reporting to hyperterm - similar to iterm2.

name: hyperlinks
description: Extension for HyperTerm that automatically links URLs.

name: hyperfull
description: Will start HyperTerm in full screen.

name: hyperterm-crosshair
description: Shows the cursor position with an horizontal and vertical highlight/ruler.

name: hyperterm-cursor
description: Allows seeing the char behind your cursor by a color difference.

name: htyt
description: Search and play youtube videos in Hyperterm.

name: hyperterm-tab-cwd
description: Add the current working directory to the header tabs in hyperterm

name: Know of another Hyperterm package? Help add it!
hyperterm-atom-dark
description: Dark - Really beautiful import of Atom One Dark theme from the official Atom theme.

name: hyperblue – Dark, cool hues. Turns HyperTerm blue.
hyperterm-deep-space
description: Dark - Dark, muted theme with good color matching.

name: hyperterm-solarized-dark
description: Dark - Pleasant and carefully chosen colors based on the popular solarized pallete.

name: hyperterm-colors
description: Dark - Sweet dark color scheme with a chocolate-y brown background and a pretty set of muted colors!

name: hyperterm-snazzy
description: Dark - Elegant theme with bright colors.

name: hyperterm-gruvbox-dark
description: Dark - Hyperterm theme with retro, earthy groove colors based on the gruvbox vim color scheme.

name: hyperpanic
description: Dark - A very pretty theme close to the Panic theme's colors. Dark blue background with very bright highlight colors.

name: hyperterm-tomorrow-night
description: Dark - Port of the popular Tomorrow Night theme.

name: hyperseti
description: Dark - It's a theme based on Seti, a subtle dark colored UI theme for Atom.

name: hyperterm-oceanic-next
description: Dark blue theme optimised for ES2015. Ported from Oceanic Next.

name: hyperterm-spacegray – Port of the popular Spacegray theme, optimized for terminal usage.
hyperhue – Dark/Rainbow
description: A theme that reacts to the colors of your Philips Hue lights.

name: hyperterm-hybrid – Dark
description: Beautiful theme, based on vim-hybrid, that combines Tomorrow-Night, Codecademy, Jellybeans, and Solarized themes together.

name: hyperterm-title – Set the title of your tabs to what your shell suggests.
hyperpunk
description: Hyperterm extension to make your terminal look Cyberpunk / Sci-fi.

name: hyperterm-one-light
description: Light - A very cute theme with extra light background based on the Atom One Light pallete.

name: hyperterm-wp-theme
description: An adaptation of the popular JetBrains Darcula Theme with support for colored tabs.

name: hyperterm-monokai
description: Dark - A port of the popular monokai theme. The colors are warm, relaxing and pleasing to the eyes.

name: hyperterm-electron-highlighter
description: Dark - Port of Atom One Dark syntax colors with more vibrant colors.

name: hyperterm-duotone-darkspace
description: Dark/Orange - A beautiful dark theme inspired by Duotone Themes by Simurai. More color variations can be found here.

name: hyperambient – Dark/Light
description: A theme that reacts to ambient light changes.

name: hyperterm-bold-tab
description: Bold's your active tab text. Makes keeping track of your current tab painless.

name: hyperterm-base16-tomorrow-dark – Dark
description: Hyperterm port of Atom's Base16 Tomorrow Dark Theme, with a pretty muted pastel pallette.

name: hyperterm-firewatch – Dark – Glowing, dark theme heavily inspired by the Firewatch game and the atom syntax theme based on it.
hyperterm-dark-macos
description: A theme that pairs nicely with macOS dark mode.

name: hyperterm-material
description: Dark - Brings the famous Material Design colors scheme in hyperterm.

name: hyperterm-sourcerer
description: A 16-bit dark theme based on xero/sourcerer.

name: hyperterm-dark-dracule
description: A dark dracula theme for Hyperterm on based Dracula theme.

name: hyperterm-panda — Panda syntax theme a superminimal, dark Syntax Theme — HyperTerm port.
hyperterm-cobalt2-theme
description: Dusty Blue, dark with vibrant pops of colour for the important stuff. Goes well with Cobalt2 ZSH theme.

name: hyperterm-unlease
description: A fresh theme for Hyperterm that makes you feel like there's one of those pine tree car air fresheners hanging from your terminal.

name: hyperterm-materialshell
description: A dark material design theme with a good contrast and color pops at the important parts. Designed to be easy on the eyes, based on materialshell.

name: hyperterm-zenburn2
description: A classic low-contrast theme originally made for vim adapted for Hyperterm

name: hypersolar-dark
description: A dark theme based loosely on Solarized Dark, with a fix for the usual solarized dark colours with blacks that actually show up in your terminal!

name: hyperterm-earthsong
description: A natural and calming theme for HyperTerm. Ported from iTerm's Earthsong theme

name: hyperterm-retro
description: A retro HyperTerm theme inspired by the cool-retro-term terminal emulator.

name: hyperterm-base16-ocean-saturated
description: Dark - Elegant theme with saturated colors.

name: hyperterm-adventurious
description: An adventure time inspired theme based on the Adventurious Atom theme.

name: hyperterm-hipster
description: A hipster theme based on the hipster-syntax theme for Atom.

name: Know of another really awesome theme? Get it on awesome-hyperterm!
Official Hyperterm Website
description: The official Hyperterm website.

name: hyperzsh
description: Zsh for HyperTerm

name: Know of another Hyperterm resource? Share the love!
